verses.roman:
"brahmaṇya-deva tumi baḍa dayā-maya
dui viprera dharma rākha hañā sadaya

synonyms: brahmaṇya-deva—O Lord of brahminical culture; tumi—You; baḍa—very; dayā-maya—merciful; dui—two; viprera—of brāhmaṇas; dharma—the religious principles; rākha—protect; hañā—becoming; sa-daya—merciful.
translation: He said, "My Lord, You are the protector of brahminical culture, and You are also very merciful. Therefore, kindly show Your great mercy by protecting the religious principles of us two brāhmaṇas.
